item.title: A new toy to play with
item.dc:creator: mattwhite
item.description: To keep my mind off other things this week, I’ve written a little reporting area in Defectr. It makes use of the WebFX Chart javascript that...
item.content:encoded: To keep my mind off other things this week, I’ve written a little reporting area in Defectr. It makes use of the WebFX Chart javascript that I mentioned a few days ago. It’s well worth a look if you haven’t already.

item.title: Oops, I’ve been Ed-Dotted
item.dc:creator: mattwhite
item.description: OK guys, apologies for the appalling performance of Defectr. The feedback from you all was incredible before Ed posted a link this afternoon, since when the...
item.content:encoded:
OK guys, apologies for the appalling performance of Defectr. The feedback from you all was incredible before Ed posted a link this afternoon, since when the server has been churning away like a good’un. I am going to try and sort out a proper hosting solution ASAP but until then please bear with me.

By the way, can anyone suggest a good hosting company, I’m tempted to just rent a dedicated server but that seems a pricey option?
